A careless admin reused a prime for two RSA public keys. Can you recover the secret message encrypted as ciphertext1: 4788073821184023132284382955971851607555466596388025099250663821542331453681524305295550639113249027789813333964934679607227538599167829585809446080222664, ciphertext2: 812447929999005493832156996816062759797332777160622144814344490488707728544858618585522429940854213725248079902145593576757704398178872447518820144222808?

The flag format is flag{...}
n1=12383357624331386362475145681235331685154489793509206086633157238495230514169542142032168049181668980293809273098749474822868905215449590628396601152190473, n2=7055323146563943489873062200565190908987886989189455432434990101389221237019711559952248206940625202842512280058986487764440516133408156099638423981082323, e=799372911045746163231384260687535427071794397106480561714258364839198485497737467883385975650112139866000056357305912299544810668763795409309918280690195

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{cjcs3a8k}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 4788073821184023132284382955971851607555466596388025099250663821542331453681524305295550639113249027789813333964934679607227538599167829585809446080222664, ciphertext2: 812447929999005493832156996816062759797332777160622144814344490488707728544858618585522429940854213725248079902145593576757704398178872447518820144222808
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=12383357624331386362475145681235331685154489793509206086633157238495230514169542142032168049181668980293809273098749474822868905215449590628396601152190473, n2=7055323146563943489873062200565190908987886989189455432434990101389221237019711559952248206940625202842512280058986487764440516133408156099638423981082323, e=799372911045746163231384260687535427071794397106480561714258364839198485497737467883385975650112139866000056357305912299544810668763795409309918280690195
extra_info: p=114426012893287475565079058586799343164063947179890837712034728986838920350869, q=108221525081713530490150961866524649318319713779701722157607831115780055985317, r=65193344311464518373062073492242649135451709040011147543692539848565730128919, φ(n1)=12383357624331386362475145681235331685154489793509206086633157238495230514169319494494193048175613750273355949106267091161909312655579948068293982175854288, φ(n2)=7055323146563943489873062200565190908987886989189455432434990101389221237019538145082855028891761989807153512760532716341620803263706855728674078194968088
